description.value:
You level your will against your ursuers, hindering their chase.

Level: 3
Category: Binding
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: 8 hours
Component Cost: 50 gp
Market Price: 250 gp
Key Skill: Arcana, Nature, Religion

A creature or creatures you can specifically name or visualize are hindered in overland travel. You make your skill check and designate a single target or group that you can visualize or name specifically. The target or leader of the target's group must make an Endurance or Nature check, with a DC equal to the result of the check you made when casting this ritual. If the target fails its Endurance or Nature check, the group's overland speed is reduced by 2 for the duration of the ritual.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 90.
